text: Mary, Countess of Blois was countess of Blois (1230-1241). Mary was born into the family of Walter of Avesnes and Margaret of Blois.(FR)Henri Platelle, Présence de l'au-delà: une vision médiévale du monde, (Presses Universitaires du Septentrion, 2004), 284. == References == Category:1200 births Category:1241 deaths
title: Mary, Countess of Blois
